findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner/Admin has substantial control over the ecosystem and can update the GeosOracle contract used to calculate MATIC price at any time.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of NFTs
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited amount of NFTs at any time.

findings.title: Centralization of Control
findings.description: The owner has permissions to control the contract, and off-chain logic is implemented.

findings.title: Dependence on Predictable Variables
findings.description: The owner has permissions to manipulate predictable variables.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw any amount of tokens at any time
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted access to withdraw any amount of tokens from the contract without limitations.

findings.title: Admin has substantial control in the ecosystem
findings.description: The Admin role has extensive control over the ecosystem, allowing them to add/remove users from the whitelist, update reserved NFT lists and owners, create new categories and tiers, set upgrade costs and multipliers, and withdraw tokens at any time.

findings.title: Potential incorrect NFT reservations and minting of multiple NFTs with the same properties
findings.description: The GeoPoly contract uses off-chain logic to prevent incorrect NFT reservations and minting of multiple NFTs with the same properties, but this off-chain logic was not reviewed in the scope of this audit.
